review: This is a very good economical way to get Amazon prime on a non-primary TV.  It only works with wireless, so be sure that you have a strong internet.  I had weak internet for my TV and so I got a wireless extender:  Edimax EW-7438RPn V2 300Mbps 802.11/b/g/n Universal Wi-Fi Range Extender, Repeater here on Amazon and it fixed my problem.
author: Bakit

review: I preordered this as soon as I saw it posted.  Couple this with your Amazon Prime membership and you've got yourself a deal.  Plus, since Netflix cancelled Top Gear, I'll just save the $7.99 a month and stream from Prime.  I got this half off and will save $8 a month.  Win/Win situation.Quality was top notch.  The included power cable and adapter were plenty long enough to hook up. No complaints here.
